name: Poseidon
author: Will Brouwers
body:
Historie

The Poseidon sunk on 31 July 1918 at Cape Delaware after a collision with a British steamer. There were 6 casualties.

Beschrijving

  • Built: 1914 by Dunlop, Bremner & Co, Glasgow
  • Owner: KNSM NV, Amsterdam
  • Length: 90.16 m
  • Width: 13,18 m
  • Speed: 10,5 knots
  • Tonnage: 1909
